ListForm.remarks: This form displays the data items and alows for Select of those items.

ListFormD.remarks: This form displays the data items and alows for Select of those items.

ListFormDA.remarks: This form displays the data items and allows for New, Edit, Delete and Select of those items.

ListFormDAW.remarks: This form displays the data items and allows for New, Edit, Delete and Select of those items.

RowAdd.summary: Adds a grid row and updates it with the record values.

RowUpdate.summary: Updates the current row with the record values.

RowSelect.summary: Selects a row based on the key record values.
RowSelect.returns: True if the record exists, otherwise false.

DoNew.summary: Displays a detail dialog for a new record.

DoEdit.summary: Displays a detail dialog to edit an existing record.

Detail_Change.summary: Adds a new list row or updates the existing list row with the changes from the detail dialog.
Detail_Change.param: The object that originated the event request.

DoSelect.summary: Sets the selected item and returns to the parent form.

InitializeControls.summary: Configures the controls and loads the selection control data.

ListChange.summary: Execute the list and related item functions.

SetControlState.summary: Sets the control states based on the current control values.
SetControlState.remarks: Sets the Tool icons and Menu items enabled if they are available otherwise they are set to disabled.

DoListChange.summary: Uses a timer to allow the list to process outstanding messages.
DoListChange.remarks: This allows the selected row to be set correctly.
